alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Montgomery; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:01AM CST until January 09 at 12:30AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... Southern San Jacinto County in southeastern Texas... West central Liberty County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1230 AM CST. * At 1200 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Porter Heights, or 11 miles northeast of Spring, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Splendora, Patton Village, Woodbranch, Plum Grove, North Cleveland and Porter Heights. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
